title: Coding
body:
Hi I'm curious if the coding for the lcs icon to show when I recall being and " if "then" type code leading me to think many attributes of the game being "if" "then " coding 

:)

replies.body:
I'm not a developer for the game, so I can't speak to what's in the code, but I'd imagine that conditional expressions probably have a home somewhere in the vast code that is League. :P

Let me know if you have any other questions.
